ai-ya2.3.4:1.1_0: One who understands the aggregate of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ya2.3.4:2.1_0: Or they don’t completely understand feelings that mass of form, or I am born from the main mas of form.
ai-ya2.3.4:3.1_0: He who doesn’t completely understand the mass of form,
ai-ya2.3.4:4.1_0: They don’t understand form, feeling, perception, or choices don’t lead to the entire spectrum of feeling.
ai-ya2.3.4:4.1_1: apart from the origin of the world, the perfected ones, and the fully awakened Buddhas. And they don’t completely understand feelings.
ai-ya2.3.4:5.1_0: One who doesn’t completely understand feelings, nor does he completely understand the entire mass of form.
ai-ya2.3.4:6.1_0: don’t understand the origin of the world.
ai-ya2.3.4:6.1_1: apart from the origin of the path and the practice that leads to the cessation of form. Nor does he conquer the mass of feeling.
